testcase.classname: Check all functionalities on the“ContactUs”page with giving the details
testcase.name: check and verify the functionalities of ContactUs page
testcase.system-out: Given launch FF browser and maximize it.....................................passed When Get the url of Scent Website...........................................passed And click the contactUs btn.................................................passed And Scroll down to form field...............................................passed And To click the full name field and enter the name.........................passed And To click the company field and enter the company name...................passed And To click the phone number field and enter the phone number..............passed And To click the mail field and enter the mail Id...........................passed And To click the country field and enter the country name...................passed And To click the mgs field and enter any mgs................................passed And To click the send btn...................................................passed And scroll down to see the map..............................................passed Then close the Scent Website................................................passed
